summary: The NSW Govt is expanding its drought plan to help farmers and communities as dry conditions continue across parts of NSW.

summary: Australian wheat for feed is finding some love in Asia as consumers look for animal rather than grain protein, and biofuel demand keeps more US corn at home.

summary: An ABARES paper shows cropping has outperformed other ag sectors on productivity growth, farm income, and export value growth.

summary: Bangladesh is bolstering food security to mitigate volatility by increasing its imports of rice and wheat.

title: Qube grain trading revenue up, Macquarie sale update
summary: The latest from Qube includes a 1H gross revenue from grain trading of $516.1M, up 52.9pc on the prior period, and an update on the Macquarie takeover.

title: Inghams HY26 profits down 65pc to $18.1M
summary: Inghams' results show times are tough for the listed poultry giant, despite relatively low costs for its key feed inputs of wheat and soymeal.

title: Last week’s trades point to firmer markets: CGX
summary: Wheat and barley trades on CGX and igrainX last week went through at $5-$20/t above published cash bids across major grades.

summary: Kansas leads small decline in wheat futures. Russian fob cash holds steady. Arable SA/Vic hangs out for end-of-week rain.
